item.title: Called of Him to Declare His Word
item.description:
Called of Him to Declare His Word by Elder Randy D. Funk, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 183rd Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2013
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Randy D. Funk, Of the Seventy

item.title: Come into the Fold of God
item.description:
